topic.title: I2P-Bote is a plugin for I2P that allows users to send and receive emails while preserving privacy. It does not need a mail server because emails are stored in DHT.
Tox Chat - Tox has no central servers that can be raided, shut down, or forced to turn over data â€” the network is made up of its users. Say goodbye to server outages!

Secure messaging, anywhere. Peer-to-peer encrypted messaging and forums Messages are stored securely on your device, not in the cloud Connect directly with nearby contacts - no Internet access required
WireGuard is an extremely simple yet fast and modern VPN that utilizes state-of-the-art cryptography.

heads is a GNU/Linux liveCD distribution aimed at people who like the aspect of controlling their privacy and anonymity on the Internet. You might have heard of Tails as a similar GNU/Linux distribution. heads was born as an answer to Tails, since Tails is using systemd as an init system and also contains non-free software.
